short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to convert dimensions between imperial and metric.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to convert the distances and weights between imperial and metric units of measure and vice versa.
